The expert: s verdict mentions that the Romney campaign has released multiple ads repeating the claim about work requirements being "gutted." This suggests that the claim has become a regular talking point for the campaign, even though it has been debunked by fact-checkers.
The fact: checking organizations PolitiFact, FactCheck.org, and the Washington Post Fact Checker have all declared the claim false. This indicates that multiple reputable sources have scrutinized the claim and found it to be inaccurate.
